metadata.name: Beachfront
metadata.description:
Moment #1 

The first addition to a collection titled "Monday Moments" where a new moment is minted weekly, to be auctioned off with a minimum bid of 0.1 ETH. Along with the photo NFT, the winner of the auction will also receive a physical print of the photograph. The size of the print is determined by the amount of the bid, reaching up to 24"X36" in size. 

Shot on 35mm Kodak Portra 400 in April of 2020.
